SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') as day, COUNT(distinct dr.uid) as userCount, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct dr.uid) from data_register dr where 1 = 1
and dr.channel = #{channel}
and dr.channel IN ( SELECT t.t_id FROM sys_tenant t WHERE t.t_type = '2' AND (t.ancestors LIKE concat('%', #{tid2}, '%') OR t_id = #{tid2}) )
and dr.channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{createTime1} and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{createTime2} group by FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT SUM(cro.recharge_amount) from config_recharge_order cro where 1 = 1
and cro.uid in
'${item}'
and date_format(cro.finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_add(#{day}, interval #{recharge} DAY) and date_format(cro.finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') is true
